FAQ.question: Where all we use word counter?
FAQ.answer: word limits are very popular on the Internet these days. There are limitations on text messaging (SMS), Yelp ratings, Facebook updates, Pinterest pins, Reddit titles and articles, eBay titles and details as well as many more. Knowing these boundaries, as well as being able to see you approach them, will make it easier for you to articulate yourself within the limits imposed

FAQ.question: Is word counter is compatible for english only or can this tool detect other languages?
FAQ.answer: word Counter is not solely for English. The tool can be useful for writing in non-English languages where character count is significant. This may be the case in Japanese, Korean, Chinese and many other languages, where characters are the base of the written language.
